::: {#e02578f5 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

raw_welfare = pd.read_spss('Koweps_hpwc14_2019_beta2.sav')
raw_welfare

welfare=raw_welfare.copy()
welfare.shape
welfare.describe()

welfare=welfare.rename(
    columns = {
        "h14_g3": "sex",
        "h14_g4": "birth",
        "h14_g10": "marriage_type",
        "h14_g11": "religion",
        "p1402_8aq1": "income",
        "h14_eco9": "code_job",
        "h14_reg7": "code_region"
        
    }
)

welfare = welfare[["sex", "birth", "marriage_type",
                  "religion", "income", "code_job", "code_region"]]
                  
welfare.shape

welfare["sex"].dtypes
welfare["sex"].value_counts()
#welfare["sex"].isna().sum()


welfare["sex"] = np.where(welfare["sex"] == 1, 'male', 'female')
welfare["sex"].value_counts()


welfare["income"].describe()
welfare["income"].isna().sum()

sex_income=welfare.dropna(subset="income")\
       .groupby("sex", as_index=False)\
       .agg(mean_income = ("income", "mean"))
sex_income

import seaborn as sns
sns.barplot(data=sex_income, x="sex", y="mean_income",
            hue="sex")
            

plt.show()

```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
![](hw6_files/figure-html/cell-2-output-1.png){width=593 height=429}
:::
:::


#각 성별 평균을 구분하기 위해 query로 뺌

::: {#247f6e41 .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
female = welfare.dropna(subset="income").query("sex == 'female'")["income"]
male = welfare.dropna(subset="income").query("sex == 'male'")["income"]  
```
:::


#표본평균

::: {#c4afe63a .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
fm=female.mean()
mm=male.mean()
```
:::


#데이터 갯수

::: {#ca9e798b .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
fc=female.count()
mc=male.count()
```
:::


#표준편차

::: {#b0078480 .cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
fs=female.std()
ms=male.std()
```
:::


#분산

::: {#5753e87d .cell execution_count=6}
``` {.python .cell-code}
fv=female.var()
mv=male.var()
```
:::


#신뢰구간

::: {#f633d176 .cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from scipy.stats import norm

z_005=norm.ppf(0.95, loc=0, scale=1)
z_005
fz_max=fm + z_005 * (fs/ np.sqrt(fc))
fz_min=fm - z_005 * (fs/ np.sqrt(fc))


z_005=norm.ppf(0.95, loc=0, scale=1)
z_005
mz_max=mm + z_005 * (ms/ np.sqrt(mc))
mz_min=mm - z_005 * (ms/ np.sqrt(mc))

```
:::


# 오차막대 그리기
